Title: Doubt
Overview: In 1964, a Catholic school nun questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student, suspecting him of abuse.
Tagline: There is no evidence. There are no witnesses. But for one, there is no doubt.
Cast: Meryl Streep, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Amy Adams
